tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Probably an excellent nurse, as others have mentioned, but not a professor. Slides were very vague and usually just of pictures, then she would ramble on for 10 minutes about something, making it difficult to determine what material is testable and what is important. Doesn\'t properly follow marking rubric and emails were passive aggressive.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Likely a good nurse. Not a great professor. Too bad you don\'t get a chance to pick if you want her as a prof or not. I hope and pray that I don\'t have any more classes with her.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I did not enjoy Darcie as a professor. She would often contradict herself and was unreliable. Her slides were terrible and during her lectures, she would often read the words or acronyms without talking about them or telling us what the acronyms meant. She was rude in responding to her emails. Overall, I would not recommend her as a professor.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Very good professor! Highly respected by students.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Darcie is an amazing nurse! She cares about students like patients and makes you want to be a better nurse for your patients. She mentors you and really helps if you have any questions. She explains concepts applicable to clinical to make sure you understand. She is nice and easygoing but expects you to do your best and support/empower your pts

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Darcie is a great instructor! Makes you feel at ease and is very helpful. Knows her stuff and - she has good experience and can answer all your questions! Very easy to get along with - the people below don\'t know what they are talking about

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Darcie is an amazing clinical instructor! Created an environment that allowed students to feel at ease and comfortable while at the same time using her expertise in her area to create great teaching experiences. Anyone would be lucky to have her as a clinical instructor. Made my rotation the most enjoyable!

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Nice person, horrible teacher. Needs to learn how to lead/teach people. Tries too hard to be your friend, not an instructor. I need a career, not a friend at this time in my life.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Only has an undergrad degree. Does not know how to teach. Has a few years experience but is not qualified to teach and it shows.
